about_the_game:
Dominate the Global Markets in World War Forex!
Step into a world where strategy meets high-stakes trading. World War Forex puts you in command of nations, alliances, and economic empires as you battle for financial supremacy. Outwit opponents, manipulate the Forex markets, and build your legacy in a game that combines the thrill of trading with the intensity of strategic warfare.

This is Early Access!
Please note, World War Forex is in its early stages of development. While the core gameplay is functional, expect ongoing updates, new features, and improvements as we grow with community feedback.

Key Features:

🌎 Massive Multiplayer Battles:

  • Compete against unlimited players on a single server in a unique turn-based, real-time hybrid system. You’ll have just 10 seconds to issue commands before the turn executes—prepare for chaos!

📈 Master the Forex Market:

  • Take control of the in-game Forex economy. Execute smart trades, sabotage rivals, and rise as the ultimate financial superpower.

🤝 Build Alliances:

  • Forge alliances with other players to protect your assets and gain strength through collaboration. Together, climb the ranks and dominate the economy.

🔥 Persistent Gameplay:

  • The war never stops. Whether online or offline, the game evolves constantly. Even if your nation falls, rebuild quickly and reclaim your glory.

⚔️ Conquer and Defend:

  • Launch strategic offensives or fortify your defenses. Every decision counts as you lead your nation through epic battles and ruthless economic rivalries.

Why Join Now?

As an Alpha player, your input will help shape the game’s development. Dive into World War Forex, and together, let’s build the ultimate strategy game. Are you ready to rise as the undisputed economic king?

Join the fight. Conquer the markets. Claim your crown!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2400s @ 2.5 GHz / AMD FX 6350 @ 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 (64bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 @ 3.5 GHz / AMD FX 8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (4GB) or the newer GTX 970 (4GB) / AMD Radeon R9 280X (3GB of VRAM) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Rule the Financial Frontier: Immerse yourself in the role of a powerful politician in a world of war and unrest. Lead your nation to prosperity through cunning forex trades and dominate the financial battlefield. Live the life of a master strategist in this innovative game
